'''1.12.1''' is a minor update for {{JE}} released on August 3, 2017, which fixes bugs.<ref name=1.12.1>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1121-released|Minecraft 1.12.1 Released}}</ref> It is not compatible with [[Java Edition 1.12|1.12]] servers.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Game credits'''
* Updated game credits to include more [[Mojang]] staff.
* Credits scroll 50% faster when viewed directly from the [[menu screen]] than through the [[End poem]].

'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Removed "Better than Prey!"

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.12.1 Pre-Release 1, 17w31a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|86016|Some Mojang staff not mentioned in {{cd|credits.txt}}
|117087|{{cd|Class.getSimpleName}} performance issue with large number of block entities
|119840|Diamonds get moved into crafting slots on any chat message
|;private
|119011|Security issue with recipe book<ref name=1.12.1/>

== Trivia ==
* This is the final version of the unsubtitled game as the next version succeeding it, [[1.12.2-pre1]], is subtitled ''Java Edition''.
* This version came exactly seven years after [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.15|Alpha v1.0.15]].
